Question: Which of the following best defines postterm pregnancy?

Option C: Last menstrual period with regular cycles

Option C: Postterm birth with features of wasting
Correct Answer: Postterm birth with features of wasting

Option B: Weekly non-stress test and amniotic fluid index
Correct Answer: Weekly non-stress test and amniotic fluid index

Option B: Induction at 39 weeks reduces adverse outcomes
Correct Answer: Induction at 39 weeks reduces adverse outcomes
